promo-list.promoFigCaptionText: this is the fig caption text
promo-list.title: Time is now
promo-list.htmlText: Cengage is committed to supporting hundreds of millions of learners who seek an education to improve their lives and achieve their dreams. By providing engaging content through scalable digital solutions, we are driving the reinvention of the education system

promo-list.promoFigCaptionText: this is the fig caption text
promo-list.title: Built for every learner
promo-list.htmlText: Cengage is committed to supporting hundreds of millions of learners who seek an education to improve their lives and achieve their dreams. By providing engaging content through scalable digital solutions, we are driving the reinvention of the education system

promo-list.title: Find out where you fit in
promo-list.htmlText: At Cengage, we believe that through the power and joy of learning, students can enrich their lives and achieve their dreams _ no matter their age, experience, abilities, or environment. Join Us.
